channel.title: Yahoo! News: Latest news headlines News Headlines | Top Stories
channel.description: The latest Latest news headlines news headlines from Yahoo! News UK. Find videos, pictures and in-depth Latest news headlines coverage from our Top Stories news section.

item.title: Three killed in police car chase
item.description: Three people have died and a fourth is seriously ill after their car crashed during a police pursuit.
item.media:text: Three people have died and a fourth is seriously ill after their car crashed during a police pursuit.

item.title: Fresh claims over Baby P's death
item.description: The tragic death of Baby P showed no sign of abating amid new claims about the quality of care he received from Haringey Council.
item.media:text: The tragic death of Baby P showed no sign of abating amid new claims about the quality of care he received from Haringey Council.

item.title: Osborne defends pound claims
item.description: George Osborne is defending his stark warning that sterling faced "collapse" - insisting he had a duty to tell voters the truth.
item.media:text: George Osborne is defending his stark warning that sterling faced "collapse" - insisting he had a duty to tell voters the truth.

item.title: Stars turn out for Charles' 60th party
item.description: The dust is settling on Highgrove after a star-studded 60th birthday party for the Prince of Wales.
item.media:text: The dust is settling on Highgrove after a star-studded 60th birthday party for the Prince of Wales.

item.title: Wildfires sweep Los Angeles
item.description: Firefighters in LA are battling wind-whipped blazes that have destroyed hundreds of homes and forced thousands of people into shelters.
item.media:text: Firefighters in LA are battling wind-whipped blazes that have destroyed hundreds of homes and forced thousands of people into shelters.

item.title: British soldier killed in Afghanistan
item.description: A British soldier has died after his patrol came under a bomb attack in Afghanistan.
item.media:text: A British soldier has died after his patrol came under a bomb attack in Afghanistan.

item.title: Two men killed in separate stabbings
item.description: One man has died and two others have been injured after a multiple stabbing incident near Wigan.
item.media:text: One man has died and two others have been injured after a multiple stabbing incident near Wigan.

item.title: Man killed in police chase
item.description: A man was killed on Sunday when a car being followed by police crashed on a motorway.
item.media:text: A man was killed on Sunday when a car being followed by police crashed on a motorway.

item.title: Arrest made after triple stabbing
item.description: Hundreds of people at a major music awards show were being quizzed after a triple stabbing on Saturday night.
item.media:text: Hundreds of people at a major music awards show were being quizzed after a triple stabbing on Saturday night.

item.title: Man dies after stabbing
item.description: A man has died after being stabbed in a town centre
item.media:text: A man has died after being stabbed in a town centre
